faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our programs, classes, and enrollment process.

beginners.question: üéì Can complete beginners join the classes?
beginners.answer: ‚úÖ Absolutely! All classes are designed for complete beginners with no programming background. We provide step-by-step curriculum and mentoring to support your growth.

classes.question: üè´ How are the classes conducted?
classes.answer: üíª Funnel's classes are hands-on, in-person sessions. You'll learn by building real-world projects.

tools.question: üõ†Ô∏è What tools and technologies will I learn?
tools.answer:
üöÄ ‚Ä¢ Web Programming Class: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
‚Ä¢ AI Class: Python, ChatGPT API, Teachable Machine

We'll guide you through every tool and show you how to use them during class.

age.question: üéÇ Is there an age limit?
age.answer:
üë• Anyone from elementary school age and up can join.
We welcome beginners of all ages‚Äîincluding college students and working professionals.
What matters most is your passion for learning.

language.question: üåç What language are the classes taught in?
language.answer:
üó£Ô∏è All classes are conducted in English.
Even if you're not confident in English yet, don't worry.
We provide guidance and support to help you follow along smoothly.

support.question: ü§ù Can I get support after the class ends?
support.answer:
üìö Yes! Funnel offers post-class support including mentoring feedback, portfolio improvement, and career counseling.
We're also building an ongoing Funnel community.

payment.question: üí≥ How do I pay? What's the refund policy?
payment.answer:
üí∞ You can pay by bank transfer or in-person after enrollment is confirmed.
Refunds are available before the course starts.
Detailed refund policy will be provided separately.

1.details: What is Generative AI, course goals, ChatGPT setup, sample conversations

2.details: Prompting basics, summaries, email & marketing copy, blog post practice

3.details: Scenario building, role-based dialogue, custom chatbot creation

4.details: How text-to-image works, logo, thumbnail, illustration creation

5.details: Canva UI walkthrough, collaborative design, banners & presentations

6.details: Ideation & planning, tool strategy, 1st version portfolio project

7.details: Image/audio model structure, face/object recognition modeling

8.details: Embedding models into the web, build a reactive AI app

9.details: What is an API?, OpenAI structure, no-code API connection

10.details: Choose topic, combine tools (chatbot + visuals + deck), mentoring support

12.details: Presentations, certification, intro to community & future career paths

level1.title: LEVEL 1 ‚Äì Basic Speaking Confidence
level1.description: Build your confidence in everyday English speaking
items: Learn how to ask questions (e.g., Could you explain again?)

level2.title: LEVEL 2 ‚Äì Situational Speaking Training
level2.description: Train expressions frequently used in class and real life
items: Common classroom expressions (e.g., I don't understand, Can you repeat that?)
Explaining or asking during practice (e.g., I clicked the wrong button)
Practice casual conversations (e.g., How was your weekend?)
Giving and receiving feedback in English

level3.title: LEVEL 3 ‚Äì IT Project Speaking Practice
level3.description: Explain your thoughts and projects in English

level4.title: LEVEL 4 ‚Äì Real-life Simulations
level4.description: Get ready for presentations, mentoring, and global communication

supplementary.title: Supplementary Practice
items: Record your speech and give yourself feedback
How to use AI Tutor (ChatGPT English mode)
